price: (Munibuke) umunsi isi izahindurwamo indi si ndetse n’ibirere (bigahindurwamo ibindi), hanyuma (ibiremwa byose) bigahagarikwa imbere ya Allah, Umwe rukumbi, Umunyembaraga z’ikirenga.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُۖ وَبَرَزُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma tubaddalu al-arḍu ghayra al-arḍi wal-samāwātu wabarazū lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
